page.title: 03Where people shopped.
page.content: We asked people in our block where they shopped.(Most of them lived in Hellidon.)This is what we found: For Immediate or Urgent Food Shopping: Staverton village(3 miles away)and 6 miles away,the small town of Daventry. For Planned or Mid-term Shopping: 1st Daventry(mainly for Supermarket and chemist).2nd:Coventry(20 miles away).3rd:Leamington(18 miles),4th: Banbury(16 miles). For Luxury Shopping:1st Milton Keynes (18 miles).2nd Leamington.3rd:Banbury, 4th Northampton(19 miles) and 5th,London(85 miles). With the exception of two people who used bicycles,all shoppers went by car. As you can see, many people were prepared to travel quite long distances to shop.Daventry was not more widely used because of'lack of choiceÂ£.
